entry.summary: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CST FOR NORTH CENTRAL MONROE COUNTY... At 422 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 6 miles northwest of Peterman, or 7 miles north of Monroeville, moving northeast at 55 mph. Rotation has become intense and a tornado is likely occurring now!
